LOCAL.TYPES: ` *"* use this source file for any type declarations (class *"* definitions, interfaces or data types) you need for method *"* implementation or private method's signature
LOCAL.IMPLEMENTATIONS: ` *"* local class implementation for public class *"* use this source file for the implementation part of *"* local helper classes
LOCAL.MACROS: ` *"* use this source file for any macro definitions you need *"* in the implementation part of the class DEFINE lmac_create_data. create object &1. &1->o_file = &2-o_file. &1->o_xml = &2-o_xml. &1->o_raw_base = &2-o_raw_base. &1->o_raw = &2-o_raw. &1->filename = &2-filename. * &1->checksum = &2-checksum. if &2-o_raw_base is bound. &1->type = &2-o_raw_base->get_type( ). &1->name = &2-o_raw_base->get_name( ). &1->package = &2-o_raw_base->directory-devclass. &1->checksum = &2-o_raw_base->get_checksum( ). &1->signature = &2-o_raw_base->get_code_signature( ). elseif &2-o_raw is bound. &1->type = &2-o_raw->get_type( ). &1->name = &2-o_raw->get_name( ). &1->package = &2-o_raw->directory-devclass. &1->checksum = &2-o_raw->get_checksum( ). &1->signature = &2-o_raw->get_code_signature( ). endif. END-OF-DEFINITION.

ITEM.DESCRIPT: Delete directory infos of the component

ITEM.SOURCE: ` DATA s_zldir TYPE zldir. s_zldir-key = key. IF s_zldir-type IS INITIAL OR s_zldir-name IS INITIAL. BREAK-POINT. ELSE. DELETE zldir FROM s_zldir. ENDIF.

ITEM.DESCRIPT: Read directory infos of the component when last imported

ITEM.SOURCE: ` DATA s_dir TYPE zldir. s_dir-key = key. SELECT SINGLE * INTO s_dir FROM zldir WHERE type = key-type AND name = key-name. result = s_dir-data.

ITEM.DESCRIPT: Write directory infos of the component

ITEM.SOURCE: ` DATA s_zldir TYPE zldir. s_zldir-key = key. s_zldir-data-change = data. GET TIME STAMP FIELD s_zldir-timestamp. IF s_zldir-type IS INITIAL OR s_zldir-name IS INITIAL. BREAK-POINT. ELSE. MODIFY zldir FROM s_zldir. ENDIF.
